programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Tiago learns that Marcial is pursuing a military operation involving Avilon Land Corporation. Alarmed by Marcial's rigorous investigation, the crime syndicate leader orders Franco to transfer Pascal to another location. Rhian joins Tiago's firearms smuggling operation in hopes of finding a lead on Pascal's whereabouts.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: After being reminded by Daniela to show good graces, Marga cannot help but feel jealous of Cassie during their double birthday celebration. Romina, meanwhile, is now determined to reopen her case. Because of this, Daniela worries that she might get in trouble. Kulas, on the other hand, does everything he can to prevent the truth from coming out. Robert conducts an investigation of his own upon learning that Daniela supposedly used her family's savings for the company's projects.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: A bunch of comments ridiculing Marga pops up on social media after the party. Afraid to lose her status in school, the young Mondragon takes her anger out on Cassie and humiliates her in front of their classmates. However, karma works fast and bites her in the back. Meanwhile, Romina takes matters into her own hands and looks for evidence to support her case. Daniela, on the other hand, rushes to cover up her tracks.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Aryann continues to push Waldo out of her life for the sake of her relationship with Tristan. Soon, Waldo runs into a mishap while working on their company's ship engine.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Tristan and Aryann investigate to clear Waldo's name from the incident on the ship. The two face a new challenge in their relationship when Tristan's ex-wife Jenna returns to their lives.

programme.title: Mahal Kita, Beksman
programme.desc: Dali's life as a make-up artist and fashion designer, is happy and gay. But when he falls in love - surprise! He's straight.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Through the years, Robert has developed a great working relationship with his secretary, Romina. This does not sit well with Robert’s daughter, Daniela, who doubts the assistant’s true intentions. Things take a turn for the worse when Daniela discovers that her old flame is Romina’s current boyfriend.

programme.title: Talk Back and You're Dead
programme.desc: A model student finds herself entangled in a relationship with a delinquent gang leader. Her perfect life is soon thrown into chaos, even as she finds a measure of happiness in the romance.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Agnes has an eventful time in Greece as Ali reveals the truth about himself to her. Later, she unexpectedly finds Valerie. Meanwhile, Iris decides to start anew, away from Ali.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Iris, Basti, and Ali put aside their differences and work together to make Ali’s event a success. Soon, the three get the chance to talk and resolve their issues.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Following Marcial's command, Jessie verifies David Pascal's hideout. She immediately alerts Ethan after confirming the location of the wanted terrorist. The soldiers then tail David in hopes of finding the warehouse of the smuggled weapons.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian's anonymous tip proves fruitful as Pascal finally falls into the hands of Ethan and his comrades. However, Franco manages to elude Ethan's grasp. After another thwarted mission, Franco shares with Tiago his suspicion that there is a traitor within their ranks.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: After receiving an anonymous tip about a vital piece of evidence connected to her rape case, Romina is determined to get it. Kulas, on the other hand, grows anxious as he finds out that the police are now after his accomplice who handled Romina’s case. He then warns Police Officer Presto to lay low. Later on, the Mondragons finally meet one of the men who abducted Marga and Cassie. Having had enough of Marga's bullying, Cassie decides to fight back.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Bent on attaining justice, Romina presses Mark to reveal the mastermind behind Marga and Cassie’s abduction. However, her relentless pursuit of the truth hits a bump in the road when she learns about the suspect’s fate. In an unexpected turn of events, Romina receives an intriguing offer from an anonymous caller. Meanwhile, Marga instigates another fight between her and Cassie. Fed up, the young Mondragon resolves to fight back.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Jenna pretends to make amends with Aryann while she plots to win back her family. Waldo conducts his investigation and finds out who the culprit is behind the company's recent scandal. A group of men assault Aryann.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Waldo resolves to reveal his past with Aryann to Tristan for the sake of his principles before leaving the company. Jenna discovers the truth about the former lovers.

programme.desc: A model student finds herself entangled in a relationship with a delinquent gang leader. Her perfect life is soon thrown into chaos, even as she finds a measure of happiness in the romance.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: Delighted that she has decided to stay in the country for good, Paco asks Anna to continue their romance. He also learns of a discovery she made, which made her commit to being involved in the investigation. Soon after, Anna tries to get more information from her family about their past.
